ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Verant Bats .000 for bards as usual
ygData.msgSnippet: OMG I HATE THE CASTING TIMER HOW FREAKING OBNOXIOUS OMG OMG OMG What can I do to fix it? Halana, now-looking-like-a-2-bit-whore 60 Shamaness =/ Tani,
ygData.messageBody:
OMG I HATE THE CASTING TIMER HOW FREAKING OBNOXIOUS OMG OMG OMG
What can I do to fix it?

Halana, now-looking-like-a-2-bit-whore 60 Shamaness =/
Tani, looking-sorta-hit-but-with-horrid-80s-shoulderpads 58 Bardette

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 05, 2001 12:36 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Verant Bats .000 for bards as usual


Relax, Slyde, they found it.

From Alan Absor:

I hate to report this, but there does indeed seem to be a problem with some
bard songs. We're working on fixing that right now.
But just so you know, the casting timer is intentional (and not the problem
with the spells). It just seemed to make sense to give bards the same
information about their casting (singing) as other casters.
Alan

-=Talies the Wanderer=-
